BuxomMod:CommonPower.NAME: Buxom
DESCRIPTIONS: Breast size increased. Generate this many Bounce stacks each turn. If your #yBuxom exceeds #b30, gain #yExposed.

BuxomMod:KCupPower.NAME: K-Cup Bra
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBra. Gain #b
#yDexterity. Whenever you gain #yBuxom, gain twice that much #yBlock.

BuxomMod:MCupPower.NAME: M-Cup Bra
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBra. Whenever you gain #yBuxom, gain #b
#yVigor.

BuxomMod:ChibiPower.NAME: Chibi
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a skill, gain an effect at random equal to its cost: NL gain Buxom, gain Chibi, deal damage to one enemy equal to your Chibi.

BuxomMod:ButtonHazardPower.NAME: Button Hazard
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b
to a random enemy whenever you gain Buxom.

BuxomMod:ReliefPower.NAME: Relief
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
Block whenever you Exhaust a card.

BuxomMod:MeasurementPower.NAME: Measurement Time
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b
Block. NL Decreases by #b4 each time your buxommod:Buxom increases.

BuxomMod:ShockPower.NAME: Omega Shock
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you have a Status card in your hand, deal damage equal to your buxommod:Buxom to a random enemy.

BuxomMod:TCupPower.NAME: T-Cup Bra
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBra. NL Gain #b
Thorns each time your Buxom increases.

BuxomMod:MilkPower.NAME: Milk
DESCRIPTIONS: Converts into #yTemporary #yHP at the end of your turn.

BuxomMod:LactatingPower.NAME: Lactating
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
#yMilk at the start of your turn. Decreases by #b2 each turn.

BuxomMod:BigBouncePower.NAME: Big Bounce
DESCRIPTIONS: Generate a #yBounce with every #b10 Bounce stacks instead, and change them to #yBig #yBounces.

BuxomMod:NakedPower.NAME: Naked
DESCRIPTIONS: Can't gain block. Every time you gain #yBuxom, draw #b
card(s).

BuxomMod:BouncePower.NAME: Bounce
DESCRIPTIONS: For every 8 stacks, generate a #yBounce status card.

BuxomMod:WhiteBikiniCupPower.NAME: White Bikini
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBra. Whenever you gain #yBuxom, gain #b
#yMilk.

BuxomMod:ExposedPower.NAME: Exposed
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose all #yBlock and can't gain #yBlock from cards. Deal #b
% bonus damage for each #yBuxom stack you have (Currently #b
% ). Lasts #b1 turn, but persists if your #yBuxom is #b30 or higher.

BuxomMod:EmbarrassmentPower.NAME: Embarrassed
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yExpose, gain #yStrength.

BuxomMod:SurprisePower.NAME: Surprise!
DESCRIPTIONS: #yExpose at the start of your next turn.

BuxomMod:SmotherPower.NAME: Smother
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes #b
damage whenever you draw a card this turn.

BuxomMod:BraBrokenPower.NAME: Bras Broken
DESCRIPTIONS: You've broken #b
bras this combat.

BuxomMod:InvoluntaryLactationPower.NAME: Panic Lactation
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a #yStrike or #yDefend, gain #b
#yMilk.

BuxomMod:EOTBlockPower.NAME: End-of-Turn Block
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
#yBlock at the end of your turn.
